title: Political thriller 'Extreme Prey' tops U.S. fiction bestseller list
text:
Political thriller 'Extreme Prey' tops U.S. fiction bestseller list
3 Min Read
(Reuters) - “Extreme Prey,” the latest political thriller from John Sandford, debuted at the top of the U.S. fiction bestseller chart on Thursday.
Data from independent, online and chain bookstores, book wholesalers and independent distributors across the United States are used to compile the list.
